name: Tavern Guardians
description:
Tavern Guardians is a Hack-and-Slash action game played in the style of a match-three. You can experience high pace action battles in this game which is totally different from former Puzzle-RPGs.
********************************************************

Awards & Reviews:
• "Satisfying strategic depth and a diverse array of foes makes Tavern Guardians an excellent addition to the genre" - PocketGamer (9/10)
• "Tavern Guardians is a refreshing new mashup of the match-three and action game." - AppAdvice (9/10)
• "Every once in a while a match-three does enough stuff differently to stand out." -148Apps (4/5 star)
• PAX East: Indie Showcase Selection
• Taipei Game Show: Indie Game Award Nominee
• Taipei Game Show: Indie House Selection

Key Features:
• Hack-and-Slash Meets Puzzle!
It's not another Puzzle RPG clone! In this game, plenty of monsters advance THROUGH tiles on the board to attack the tavern. You can slash them by simply tile-matching at the high pace of an action game.

• Strategic Battle!
You can choose one of four different heroes, then use and combine all kinds hero skills like stunning, knocking back and direct damage so that you can control the enemies' position and defeat them easier.

• Replayability!
We've prepared 20 hero skills, over 60 unique items and nearly 50 monsters for the game. The abundant random combinations will greatly increase the replayability. Try all the combinations between items and heroes to challenge for the top rank!
